duration.question: How long does a real estate dispute lawsuit take?
duration.answer: It varies depending on the complexity of the case, but generally takes about 6 months to 1 year. Simple cases can be resolved more quickly.

free.question: Is real estate dispute consultation free?
free.answer: Yes, initial consultation is provided free of charge. Through consultation, we understand the overview of the case and present solutions.

types.question: What types of real estate disputes do you handle?
types.answer: We handle all real estate-related legal issues including real estate contract disputes, ownership disputes, lease disputes, and construction disputes.
